data.title: Novar Technologies
data.meta_description:
Novar Technologies | 726 followers on LinkedIn. Freeform Lens Designer | 8K lenses & AI-powered progressives 
 | NOVAR Technologies is a division of Opulens Corporation focused on developing technology for independent laboratories and ECPs. Our drive to find improvements in the field of ophthalmic optics has made us one of the pioneers in the manufacture of lenses with FREEFORM technology. 

We have an in-house R&D team to develop lens designs and measuring devices that meet the needs of increasingly demanding professionals.
